title: Attending Solid State Materials Chemistry Hackathon
details: I will be attending the Solid State and Materials Chemistry Collaboration Incubator (SSMC-CI) series at the University of Wisconsin–Madison.
The event will be held May 20–23, 2025.

title: Published to JACS
details: Collaborators from Hunter College (CUNY) and IIT published an article.
We applied unsupervised learning based on features generated with SAF, which I developed with Prof. Anton Oliynyk.
SAF was previously featured in *Digital Discovery*. My contribution was the development of SAF.
